attributes.action: Include annual minimum wage coverage for self-employed during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: With Coronvirus wide-spreading in UK, many self-employed people are living in fear and complete uncertainty. Every minute, the economy suffers more, and every minute, someone out there is losing their job.
attributes.background: We propose an annual minimum wage for self-employed people to survive through the Coronavirus pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303345
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
